about_the_game:
This Playtest Demo includes the full content of the game, allowing players to test whether there are any additional issues with the Steam version in advance. Please note that the game itself will be completely free.

REMAINS is a mix of genres with its core as a platformer: side view, familiar game mechanics (jumping, climbing stairs). A rich arsenal of weapons plus fights being a crucial part of the game give you vibes of 2D-shooter. Finally, you can take it as a roguelike game with exploring procedurally generated locations, picking locks, gathering loot, leveling up and learning new skills/perks, crafting, trading, etc.

The amount of content right now is huge: several large locations with numerous kinds of rooms, almost a hundred types of enemies, about two hundred types of weapons and explosives, dozens of spells, more than sixty perks and plenty of other things. The development is complete, but new versions may appear in the future.

FOE:Remains is created by a team of enthusiasts led by Empalu. The idea of this game originates from Fallout: Equestria book authored by Kkat.

The game takes its place in the Equestrian Wasteland, but its storyline is not connected with the book's one, it is a standalone work based on the same universe. If you want to learn more about history of this world, the Great War and a following apocalypse, you should familiarize yourself with Fallout: Equestria.

legal_notice:
Fallout: Equestria is a crossover between Fallout game series and My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic show. In a nutshell, it is "post-apocalypse with ponies", but the book itself and a lot of derived fan works forms a whole alive universe.REMAINS has no direct relationship neither with "Fallout" series nor with the show about ponies, though, of course, some references occur here and there.
All trademarks, logos, and brand names used in FOE: Remains are the property of their respective owners. All company, product, and service names used in this game are for identification purposes only. The use of these names, trademarks, and brands does not imply any endorsement, sponsorship, or affiliation with the Fallout series, My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic, or any other related entities.

  • Processor: 1.2 GHz processor or higher

  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: FOE:Remains is a hardcore post-apocalyptic action RPG that mixes platformer, 2D shooter, and roguelike elements. Travel around the wasteland and explore its various corners, communicate with locals and help them, level up, and fight enemies using a vast arsenal of weapons and magic.
supported_languages: English, German, Russian, Polish, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese
